description: A man-page generator from JSON specifications following user-argspec
longDescription:
mangen takes input of a JSON file which specifies formally specifies the command-line interface of an application and generates a man page written in roff notation.
By default, the JSON spec is taken from stdin, and the man-output is given on stdout.
